document.title: Health Issues of Women of Color
document.abstract: This workshop will forcus on a variety of women's health issues . We will discuss how women are impacted by certain disease (including AIDS, Heart Disease,Cancer, Breast Disease, and STDs and how women are affected differently than men in some cases. You will learn how to make healthy life style choices.

field.name: location
field.value: Carolyn P. Brown Memorial University Center
